attributes.action: Improve the existing Tyne & Wear Metro System infrastructure before considering extending the system into Teesside.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current Tyne & Wear Metro struggles to cover passenger needs in Tyne & Wear, especially Sunderland.  Therefore, extending the system would not be feasible until the needs of Tyne & Wear are met first.
